entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
